title: 又係時間推吓網購平價Notebook(27)

replies.msg:
估唔到反應咁熱烈 第一次續po有咩問題請賜教
呢到有其他巴打都會解答到買notebook問題 (例如保養問題, specs)


1. 5千幾至6千幾8代勁版i5 + 1050ti, 15.6吋, 連ssd (以前5千幾果部可能因太多人買成日無貨了)

https://www.amazon.com/8th-Gen-i5-8300H-processor-GeForce-FireCuda/dp/B07HRZDDJX/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1528526461&sr=8-1&keywords=asus%2B8300h&th=1

2. 6千到8300h+1060 3gb

https://www.newegg.com/global/hk-en/p/N82E16834235081?Description=8300h 1060&cm_re=8300h_1060-_-34-235-081-_-Product

3. 3千幾 8代basic u文書機 15.6吋

https://www.amazon.com/VivoBook-i5-8250U-NanoEdge-Fingerprint-F510UA-AH51/dp/B0762S8PYM/ref=sr_1_2?s=electronics&ie=UTF8&qid=1528526495&sr=1-2&keywords=asus+8250u

4. 6千幾8代basic i7 + mx150獨顯(同gt1030同specs) + ssd, slim機 13.3

https://www.amazon.com/VivoBook-i7-8550U-GeForce-NanoEdge-Display/dp/B07B7VFTN9/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1532765314&sr=8-1&keywords=asus+8550u+mx150

5. 8千幾 6核i7 8750h + 1060, 15.6吋

https://www.amazon.com/Gaming-i7-8750H-Display-Gigabit-FX504GM-ES74/dp/B07F6K21HJ/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&qid=1535397691&sr=8-5&keywords=asus+8750h+1060&dpID=411ln44EZAL&preST=_SY300_QL70_&dpSrc=srch

6. 6千幾, 8750h + 1050ti

https://www.amazon.com/i7-8750H-Processor-GeForce-Gigabit-Windows/dp/B07DY11M1F/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=8750h+1050ti&qid=1565352995&s=gateway&sr=8-1

7. amd最新3500u機 (購買前請查清楚amd cpu能否達到閣下功能需要)

https://www.amazon.com/ASUS-VivoBook-R5-3500U-Graphics-F512DA-EB51/dp/B07QQB7552/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=asus+3500u&qid=1561204992&s=gateway&sr=8-1

(asus有國際保而香港代理又認可, 所以美國買都有保)

intel 9代u系列 (boost clock比起8代u提升左少少, 但性能無大差別, 價錢就無8代u咁抵)

1. 8265u 文書機

https://www.amazon.com/Vivobook-Portable-NanoEdge-I5-8265U-Processor/dp/B07MNTRQ8Q/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1550283510&sr=8-1&keywords=asus+8265u

2. 8265u + mx150 輕薄機 13.3

https://www.amazon.com/Ultra-Slim-WideView-i5-8265U-Processor-Fingerprint/dp/B07JB56QJ7/ref=sr_1_4?ie=UTF8&qid=1550283555&sr=8-4&keywords=asus+8265u
注意頭po已outdate 有咩想知請問

asus a15 定g14 好 諗住遲啲攞去外國用
上網見啲review 都話g14 會好熱
想知如果a15 攞出街方唔方便
G14你知唔知等到幾時

外國買g14 還好 香港真係搵笨7

A15 其實唔係真係咁重 都係差g14 1kg姐

依家呢個世代出d機厚得去邊 笨重得去邊啦
A15有冇話邊度買


A15 美亞買最抵玩
有大電

但最近都冇咩貨

第一次續po有咩問題請賜教

呢到有其他巴打都會解答到買notebook問題 (例如保養問題, specs)

1）
下面分咗唔同價錢，兩邊CPU 陣營嘅推薦型號，唔知買咩可以參考下
(只有比較出名，大路嘅型號)
(疫情影響未有Link，只有型號，Link之後等多啲Sold by Amazon 補返)

Intel (9 / 10th)
文書：

<$6000 ：Acer swift 3，ASUS Vivobook S14
<$10000 ：Acer Swift 5，ASUS Zenbook 13/14，ASUS Vivobook S15，MSI Prestige 14
>$10000 ：Dell XPS13/15/17 (2020)，ASUS Zenbook 15，ASUS Expertbook B9，MSI Prestige 15

Gaming
(每個型號嘅規格都會有唔同，最大路e.g. i7-10750H/16gb ram/512 m.2 SSD/1660ti)

<$6000 ：/
<$10000 ：MSI GF65，Acer predator helios 300，ASUS Strix G15
>$10000 ：MSI GE/GF/GT series，ASUS Zephyrus M15/S15/S17，ASUS Strix Scar 15，Eluktronics Max-15/17，Aorus 15G/Aero 15 2020


AMD 4000 series
（AMD目前都係少機，尤其高階款，可以等年尾會多啲款）
文書：

<$6000 ：Acer swift 3（AMD），ASUS Vivobook S14（AMD)
<$10000 ：Dell Inspiron 14，MSI Prestige 14(AMD 2020 Version，未出)
>$10000 ：/

Gaming：
(每個型號嘅規格都會有唔同，最大路e.g. R7-4800H/16gb ram/512 m.2 SSD/1660ti/RTX2060)

<$6000 ：/
<$10000 ：Dell G5 SE，ASUS TUF A15/17，ASUS Zephyrus G15，ASUS Zephyrus G14，MSI Bravo 15/17
>$10000 ：ASUS Zephyrus G14，MSI Alpha 15/17


2）
唔知自己需求？睇下下面啲Youtube 片，有廣東話、國語、英文
(只供參考，入面嘅機可能Outdated，唔代表入邊介紹嘅機係好）

1.https://youtu.be/RPdvVju8WLY
2.https://youtu.be/UBAYU5aKC4A
3.https://youtu.be/39YqCLYELnM


3）
-得ASUS有1年國際保，不過盡量揀返可靠嘅銷售商（e.g. Sold by Amazon)，香港代理認可(前提係你係可靠嘅銷售商買）
-Dell都有得轉國際保，不過只限官網買，自己轉保養Plan


4）
話就話網購，請唔好Po支寶/京東！


5）
有問題，或唔知點揀，可以留言問
(請打底：用途、Budget、有乜心水型號/牌子）

<$6000 ：/

AMD 4000 series

<$10000 ：Dell Inspiron 14，MSI Prestige 14(AMD 2020 Version，未出)
>$10000 ：/

replies.msg:
The new series of RedmiBook laptops is here after much teasing by Xiaomi. Launched alongside the Redmi 10X, Xiaomi will offer the RedmiBook in three display options. Called the RedmiBook 13, RedmiBook 14 and RedmiBook 16, all will be available with the same choices of processors, RAM and storage. A 1 TB SSD will only be available with on the RedmiBook 13, though.

As we have covered previously, the new RedmiBooks will have 90% screen-to-body ratios and will offer 100% coverage of the sRGB colour space. The devices have two USB Type-A ports, two Type-C ports, an HDMI output, a fingerprint scanner and a 3.5 mm headphone jack too.

The RedmiBook 16 will also have a 46 Wh battery, which seems rather small for such a large device. Similarly, the RedmiBook 13 and RedmiBook 14 have 40 Wh batteries. According to Gadgets 360, all three devices will have 1080p panels, but the RedmiBook 16 will get 50 nits brighter than the others at 300 nits. Additionally, the devices will have the following footprints:

RedmiBook 13: 307.3 x 195 x 17.8 mm - 1.23 kg
RedmiBook 14: 320 x 203 x 16.85 mm - 1.2 kg
RedmiBook 16: 367.20 x 232.85 x 17.55 mm - 1.8 kg

「6月1更新」
第一次續po有咩問題請賜教

呢到主要都係講下新Notebook，
同埋有巴打會解答到買notebook問題 (例如保養問題, specs)

麻煩睇一睇1-5先問問題，Thanks

————————————————————

1）
下面分咗唔同價錢，兩邊CPU 陣營嘅推薦型號，唔知買咩可以參考下

(只有比較出名，大路嘅型號)
(以下係冇Lenovo)
(疫情影響未有Link，只有型號，Link之後等多啲Sold by Amazon 補返)

Intel (9 / 10th)

文書：

<$6000 ：Acer swift 3，ASUS Vivobook S14
<$10000 ：Acer Swift 5，ASUS Zenbook 13/14，ASUS Vivobook S15，MSI Prestige 14
>$10000 ：Dell XPS13/15/17 (2020)，ASUS Zenbook 15，ASUS Expertbook B9，MSI Prestige 15

Gaming：

(每個型號嘅規格都會有唔同，最大路e.g. i7-10750H/16gb ram/512 m.2 SSD/1660ti)

<$6000 ：/
<$10000 ：MSI GF65，Acer predator helios 300，ASUS Strix G15
>$10000 ：MSI GE/GT series，ROG M15/S15/S17，ROG Scar 15，Eluktronics Max-15/17，Aorus 15G/Aero 15

Creator：

(Creator Nb 係指有單調外表，靚Mon，強勁嘅效能(通常H系CPU配獨立顯示卡），專為創作者而設嘅Nb)
(每個型號嘅規格都會有唔同，最大路e.g. i7-10750H/>16gb ram/>512 m.2 SSD/RTX/Quadro RTX)

>$10000 ：MSI Creator 15/17，ASUS Proart Studiobook 系列，Aero 15 2020，Acer Concept D7


AMD（4000 series）
（AMD目前都係少機，尤其高階款，可以等年尾會多啲款）

文書：

<$6000 ：Acer swift 3（AMD），ASUS Vivobook S14（AMD)
<$10000 ：Dell Inspiron 14（AMD），MSI Modern 14（AMD），ASUS Zenbook 14（AMD），HP ENVY/X360（AMD）
>$10000 ：/

Gaming：

(每個型號嘅規格都會有唔同，最大路e.g. R7-4800H/16gb ram/512 m.2 SSD/RTX2060)

<$6000 ：Dell G5 SE
<$10000 ：Dell G5 SE，ASUS TUF A15/17，ROG G15，ROG G14，MSI Bravo 15/17，XMG Core 15/17（AMD），Eluktronics Matrix RP15/17（AMD）
>$10000 ：ASUS Zephyrus G14，MSI Alpha 15/17


————————————————————
2）
唔知自己需求？睇下下面啲Youtube 片
(只供參考，入面嘅機可能Outdated，唔代表入邊介紹嘅機係好）

1.

https://youtu.be/RPdvVju8WLY

2.

https://youtu.be/UBAYU5aKC4A

3.

https://youtu.be/eKCEGm5vngY

4.

https://youtu.be/39YqCLYELnM


————————————————————
3）
可靠網購網站：Amazon US,UK/Bestbuy/ASUS US,UK/Dell US

如果係Amazon買，記得最好揀Sold By Amazon ，有保障啲，有乜事直接搵CS

香港保養：

網購得ASUS有1年香港保養，同Dell！！

-得ASUS有1年國際保，盡量揀返可靠嘅銷售商（e.g. Sold by Amazon)，香港代理認可(前提係係可靠嘅銷售商買）

-Dell都有得轉國際保，只限官網買，自己轉保養Plan


————————————————————
4）
話就話網購，請唔好Po支寶/京東！


————————————————————
5）
-有問題，或唔知點揀，可以留言問

-不過唔好就咁攤大隻手問，麻煩都打低：用途、Budget、有乜心水型號/牌子 etc.

For其他巴打知你需要乜先，咁我哋先幫到你

quote.msg:
The new series of RedmiBook laptops is here after much teasing by Xiaomi. Launched alongside the Redmi 10X, Xiaomi will offer the RedmiBook in three display options. Called the RedmiBook 13, RedmiBook 14 and RedmiBook 16, all will be available with the same choices of processors, RAM and storage. A 1 TB SSD will only be available with on the RedmiBook 13, though.

As we have covered previously, the new RedmiBooks will have 90% screen-to-body ratios and will offer 100% coverage of the sRGB colour space. The devices have two USB Type-A ports, two Type-C ports, an HDMI output, a fingerprint scanner and a 3.5 mm headphone jack too.

The RedmiBook 16 will also have a 46 Wh battery, which seems rather small for such a large device. Similarly, the RedmiBook 13 and RedmiBook 14 have 40 Wh batteries. According to Gadgets 360, all three devices will have 1080p panels, but the RedmiBook 16 will get 50 nits brighter than the others at 300 nits. Additionally, the devices will have the following footprints:

RedmiBook 13: 307.3 x 195 x 17.8 mm - 1.23 kg
RedmiBook 14: 320 x 203 x 16.85 mm - 1.2 kg
RedmiBook 16: 367.20 x 232.85 x 17.55 mm - 1.8 kg
